detection-configuration:
detectionName: name_of_the_detection_test
description: This is the detection used by online service
rules:
- detection:
  - name: detection_rule_1
    type: PERCENTAGE_RULE
    params: {offset: wo1w, percentageChange: 0.2}
  filter:
  - name: filter_rule_1
    type: PERCENTAGE_CHANGE_FILTER
    params: {pattern: UP_OR_DOWN, threshold: 0.05}
  quality:
  - name: data_sla_rule_1
    type: DATA_SLA
    params: {sla: 3_DAYS}
metric: online_metric_admin
dataset: online_dataset_admin
dataset-configuration:
timeColumn: date
timeUnit: DAYS
timeDuration: 1
timeFormat: SIMPLE_DATE_FORMAT:yyyyMMdd
timezone: US/Pacific
